basics.name: Mijung Lee
basics.label: Web Developer
basics.summary: As a front-end developer with a keen eye for detail, I am committed to crafting an intuitive user experience, with the use of practical, well-encapsulated code. I am self-motivated, adept at problem solving, and an quick learner.

projects.name: Tweeter
projects.summary: Solo assignment. A single-page Twitter clone.

work.summary: I was in charge of developing highly customized sites that were user-friendly for both the clients and their customer base. My responsibilities included researching and selecting an appropriate tech-stack, maintaining existing sites, and providing practical advice from a development standpoint. Working closely with the design team, I helped to deliver unique and beautiful products.

Along with helping customers with a broad array of services and training new employees, I was in charge of the handling and record keeping of the treasury. This required paying close attention to minute details to complete complex tasks involving large sums of money, without error. There were many instances of high stress circumstances, where I had to quickly find efficient solutions to solve the problem at hand.

I led the shipment team and managed the backstock inventory, which involved working within time constraints and allocating tasks to the appropriate associates. I also assisted with the placement and merchandising of inventory, developing an eye for detail and design.
